attributes.action: only charge stamp duty on the difference between the threshold figure and the purchase price, NOT on the whole amount.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Also, if there has to be stamp duty at all, replace the 3% band with 2%, so that there is a phased increase and not a sudden leap from 1% at £250,001, impose a 3% rate on houses over £500,000, 4% on those over £750,000 with a top rate of 5% on property over £1,000,000. That way, those who can really afford it can pay, while everyone else pays a relatively small increase as thresholds are exceeded.
